Prerequisites

Benefits

When firing a bolt action or sniper rifle while using a magnified optic of 1.5x or greater, the Combat Point cost is reduced by 4. When attempting to repair a bolt action or sniper rifle, the character receives a +6 bonus. Also, a character with this feat can increase their range increment by 100â€™ when using a bolt action or sniper rifle with a magnified optic of 1.5x or greater. This change is after any equipment, racial abilities, or feats that increase or decrease range.
